title: A discourse upon this saying: the spirit of the nation is not yet to be trusted with liberty; lest it introduce monarchy, or invade the liberty of conscience.
author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.
publisher: printed by J.C. for Henry Fletcher, at the three Gilt Cups in Paul's Church-yard,
notes: Signed and dated: Ja. Harrington. May 16. MDCLIX.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library and the Harvard library.
